**[Please read this before submitting your report.](https://stackoverflow.com/help/minimal-reproducible-example)** By submitting this bug report, you acknowledge that you have read this and understand that issues with limited information will naturally take longer to resolve.

# Describe the bug
*A clear and concise description of what the bug is.*

# Expected behavior
*A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.*

# To Reproduce
*Steps to reproduce the behaviour.* **If applicable, please provide a minimal reproducible example.**

# Error message
*If applicable, please include the error message and/or full stack trace.*

# Screenshots
*If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. Please do not screenshot code but provide code in text form.*

# Environment
*Please include detailed information about your operating system and code version. Note: This has only been tested with linux operating systems at this point in time.*

# Additional context
*Add any other context about the problem here.*
